name: Dream Factory (itch)
description:
DREAM FACTORY
by Niki and Chris for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Dream Factory is a single - up to a massive multiplayer offline game about producing good dreams without letting things get out of control - because nobody likes nightmares, right?

Your dream factory requires a lot of the right controls to keep producing good dreams. But staying in control is harder than it seems when you have to handle all processes at once.

All factory operators play on the same keyboard and control their dream factory with up to 10 fingers. Further game modes let you not only adventure in dream factory land by yourself but also in multiplayer modes, such as Battle Mode (up to 4 player) and Romantic Mode (up to 35 players).

CONTROLS

1. Mouse to navigate the menu
2. Keyboard to control your dream factory

RULES

1. Serve your dream factory the controls it asks for by holding or releasing the appropriate control.
2. When you lose control your dream factory will produce nightmares and eventually takes damage.
3. If your dream factory is destroyed, children and grown-ups all over the world will have nightmares. Better try next time :)

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

0. Windows only
1. Download the zipped file
2. Unzip the file
3. Start the DreamFactory.exe
4. Run the game
